Summary: Hovering circular lights then fast moving object.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Trenton
There were no other sightings in Trenton on or around November 18th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsThis has been spotted on a REGULAR Basis by a number of people on a weekly basis , then today I have witnessed this myself with another person a medium to fast moving object with totally no sound, the lights are red , blue and yellow , most often spotted around Atlantic Country around 9pm till Midnight , Today have witnessed it at 10:49-10:59 , yet again No sound , very clear night , Moving North by North west at a considerable speed , normal military flight patterns for the area do not match they tend to head north then east . and are very low and very loud even at night this was not a military transporter . First Witness has seen this many times on the way home from work , has mentioned it to other people , this is the first night 2 people have seen the same object and can confirm no sound object appears to be very large compared to a standard military transport at the same height would = 1.5 to 2 times the size .. other aircraft movement at higher altitudes can be seen , no intervention was seen . no media available as yet due to personal experience only lasted 5 mins , before it went below the forest line but could be seen thru the forest trees now and then will try and get GPS Cords soon
